advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher and mipu94 of SEFCOM lab, ASU. working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
Jack Dates of RET2 Systems, Inc. (@ret2systems) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A cross-origin issue with iframe elements was addressed with improved tracking of security origins.

advisories.impact: A malicious website may be able to access restricted ports on arbitrary servers
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved input validation.
